title: Uncut Gems
short_plot_summary: A charismatic New York City jeweler and gambling addict risks everything in pursuit of the ultimate win.
explanation: A gem, representing the valuable uncut gem central to the plot
A basketball, signifying the high-stakes sports betting involved in the story
A stack of money, symbolizing the immense debts and financial trouble faced by the main character
A running man, illustrating the constant race against time and pressure the protagonist experiences
A gun, reflecting the dangerous and criminal world the character finds himself entangled in
